# Stock Analysis App
> AI agent built full-stack Taiwan stock analysis platform with ML predictions

## What this is
FastAPI backend + Lightweight Charts frontend for Taiwan stock market analysis.
ML predictions using Random Forest with Walk-Forward validation.
HMM regime detection (Bull/Sideways/Bear states).
CPCV validation framework for strategy evaluation.

## Key files
- server.py: FastAPI main app, all endpoints
- backtest/: Backtrader integration, strategies
- static/: Frontend HTML/JS
- tests/: 28+ unit tests

## Quick start
pip install -r requirements.txt
python server.py
